commits.author: Simon Willnauer
commits.sourceNew: /** * Returns true iff the ref ends with the given suffix. Otherwise * false. * * @param ref * the {@link BytesRef} to test * @param suffix * the expected suffix * @return Returns true iff the ref ends with the given suffix. * Otherwise false. */ public static boolean endsWith(BytesRef ref, BytesRef suffix) { return sliceEquals(ref, suffix, ref.length - suffix.length); }
